text: It was a hot muggy night in old Montreal.  We stroll down the waterfront into this restaurant it was very quiet well air-conditioned the service and crew were incredibly friendly sake was chilled and the Greek salad was to die for.  Oysters very fresh.....I will be back!

MUST GO!  Best food my wife and I have had in Montreal in a long time. Great concept of small portions let's you try several dishes. Doesn't matter what you choose, you can't go wrong! We will be back for sure!
I ordered la Copa pizza and Blonde de Chambly that was like disco bar in my mouth! I'll come back again!
Hot new place in the heart of old Montreal. The atmosphere and decor is breathtaking. Sushi in a medieval cave anyone? Sign me up!
